definitions.text: a piece of cutlery with a shallow bowl-shaped container and a handle; used to stir or serve or take up food
as much as a spoon will hold
examples: he added two spoons of sugar

definitions.text: formerly a golfing wood with an elevated face
scoop up or take up with a spoon
examples: spoon the sauce over the roast

definitions.text: snuggle and lie in a position where one person faces the back of the others
